dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause and mentioned the high VCORE 725mV usage.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM/DDR/VCORE chain but did not mention the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages but missed some CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical, and MMDVFS was correctly ruled out as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.
